Title: Doraemon: 2112-nen Doraemon Tanjou
Description: ['The movie is sort of a prequel to the entire series, it showed the life of Doraemon before traveling to the 20th century: How he was made, how he was partially broken, how he lost his ears, how he met the Nobi family and decides to return to the past to help Nobita.']
Related: ['Sequel: Doraemon', 'Other: Doraemon Movie 16: Nobita no Sousei Nikki']
Characters: ['Doraemon', 'Honekawa, Suneo', 'Gouda, Takeshi', 'Dorami', 'Dora-nichov', 'El Matadora', 'Dora the Kid', 'Noramyako', 'Teraodai', 'Fujio F., Fujiko']
Voices: ['Ooyama, Nobuyo', 'Kimotsuki, Kaneta', 'Tatekabe, Kazuya', 'Yokozawa, Keiko', 'Ichiryuusai, Teiyuu', 'Ikura, Kazue', 'Yokoyama, Chisa', 'Minaguchi, Yuko', 'Nagai, Ichiro']
